name: Water Mill
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The water mill has a rhythmic, industrious atmosphere with the sound of flowing water powering the grinding stones and the scent of grain being processed into flour. The air carries the promise of sustenance and the essential nature of food production, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of harnessing natural power and the importance of transforming raw materials into life-sustaining products.
